items.title: Takanori will give a talk at University of Arizona XR Summit (November 14, 2025): A Cosmic View of Life on Earth: Planetarium-Scale Visualization of Biological Data Using Astronomical Software.
Incoming seminar talks: UA AI Club (Takanori: Oct 22, Sandra: Nov 12); Asiagraphics (Takanori: Oct 28); Seminar at TU Wien (Sandra, Takanori: Oct 31).
One paper will be presented at ACM SCF 2025.
Our five papers will be presented at IEEE VIS 2025.
One paper will be presented at ACM UIST 2025.
